user_query: I want to surprise my family with a special dinner tonight. Can you suggest some cocktail recipes that pair well with a delicious meal? Also, find the details of a specific cocktail with the ID '45'. Additionally, recommend some soothing songs to create a relaxing ambiance. Finally, provide me with the nearest places to buy the ingredients for the cocktails and groceries for the dinner.

TaskList.description: Suggest cocktail recipes that pair well with a dinner meal.
Retrieve details of the specific cocktail with ID '45'.
Recommend soothing songs to create a relaxing ambiance.
Find the nearest places to buy cocktail ingredients and groceries for dinner.
